query.prompt: Show contractions of preposition and article in French. No examples are needed.
query.result: * au = à + le * aux = à + les * du = de + le * des = de + les

query.prompt:
This text is written in French. Create a word table showing the Lemma for each word. The entries in the table are Word, Lemma, Part of Speech, Gender, Number, Person, Tense, Mood and Note.
* Decompose the contraction in Lemma. * Leave blank if not applicable. * Words linked by an apostrophe should be separated. * The Note should be writtern in brief, e.g. archaic. * Quotation marks should be excluded. Apostrophes in contractions are not quotation marks. * If the verb and the other word are combined, they should be separated by Lemma. In such cases, only the verb information should be written in the other columns.
1 Au milieu du chemin de notre vie 9 je dirai des autres choses que j’y ai vues. 28 Puisque j’eus un peu reposé mon corps las, 67 Il me répondit : « Pas un homme, un homme je fus jadis,
query.result: |Word|Lemma|Part of Speech|Gender|Number|Person|Tense|Mood|Note| |---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---| |Au|à + le|preposition|m.|sg.||||contraction| |milieu|milieu|noun|m.|sg.||||| |du|de + le|preposition|m.|sg.||||contraction| |chemin|chemin|noun|m.|sg.||||| |de|de|preposition||||||| |notre|notre|possessive adjective||||||| |vie|vie|noun|f.|sg.||||| |je|je|pronoun|||1|||| |dirai|dire|verb|||1|future|indicative|| |des|de + les|preposition||pl.||||contraction| |autres|autre|adjective||pl.||||| |choses|chose|noun|f.|pl.||||| |que|que|conjunction||||||| |j’|je|pronoun|||1|||| |y|y|adverb||||||| |ai|avoir|verb|||1|present|indicative|| |vues|voir|verb||pl.||past|participle|| |Puisque|puisque|conjunction||||||| |j’|je|pronoun|||1|||| |eus|avoir|verb|||1|past|subjunctive|| |un|un|indefinite article|m.|sg.||||| |peu|peu|adverb||||||| |reposé|reposer|verb||||past|participle|| |mon|mon|possessive adjective|m.|sg.||||| |corps|corps|noun|m.|sg.||||| |las|las|adjective|m.|sg.||||| |Il|il|pronoun|m.|sg.|3|||| |me|me|pronoun|||1|||| |répondit|répondre|verb|||3|past|indicative|| |Pas|pas|adverb||||||| |un|un|indefinite article|m.|sg.||||| |homme|homme|noun|m.|sg.||||| |un|un|indefinite article|m.|sg.||||| |homme|homme|noun|m.|sg.||||| |je|je|pronoun|||1|||| |fus|être|verb|||1|past|indicative|| |jadis|jadis|adverb||||||archaic|
